title: Reciprocal Triginometric Identity
text: Recall that cscx is equal to $$\frac{1}{sinx}$$

title: Pythagorean identities
text: Recall that $$1$$ + $$tan\left(x\right) tan\left(x\right)$$ is equal to $$\operatorname{sec}\left(x\right) \operatorname{sec}\left(x\right)$$
